title: Children's world of travel
creator_credit: Shin Riken Motion Pictures and Japan. Ministry of Foreign Affairs
brief_description: Children have many dreams and there is a common dream the whole world over - travel. In this film, the dreams of Japanese children come true - in the realm of modern Japanese transport, with examples of the fast gleaming monorail, cable cars and other unusual systems in use in Japan today.
